segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a total disaster with water flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing like some gross plumbing nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's just standing in it, drying a plate without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's soaked—how unhygienic is that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are filthy, climbing on a stool to raid the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand is probably all sticky inside there now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, begging for a share of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's streaming down the cabinets—it's going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's a slippery puddle waiting to cause trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the neat garden outside can't hide this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the sight of all this avoidable grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to clean up this revolting scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
